name: Lucid
summary: At Lucid, I work in the Fulcrum business unit which is a programmatic sample (i.e. survey) exchange platform as an engineer. I work closely with our sales and client managers to produce value and innovate without being bogged down my the needs of a traditional tech team.

I spend half my time focusing on professional services where I help Lucid’s customers integrate with Fulcrum’s APIs. I spend the rest of my time in Lucid Labs generating ideas and developing moonshot experiments to innovate the industries in which Lucid operates.
